items.sentence: Tom held the stuffed animal close to his chest.
Do you think anyone was here while we were out?
Do you think anyone would care if Tom did that?
Do you think that Tom and Mary have to do that?
I just hope I get to stay with Tom for a while.
Both Tom and Mary want to learn how to do that.
Tom won\'t be able to lift that box by himself.
I might have something here that will help you.
Tom is the one who makes coffee in the morning.
Tom seems to be the only one who wants to sing.
Tom said he didn\'t want to live anywhere else.
I could see Tom wasn\'t in the mood to do that.
There are many websites that aren\'t very good.
I think that things like this happen by chance.
Tom told me that he\'d do that, but he didn\'t.
Tom doesn\'t have any goats. He only has sheep.
I don\'t have anything else I have to do today.
Tom must\'ve known Mary wouldn\'t want to sing.
I wonder whether or not Tom wants to buy a car.
Show me something that I can wear to a banquet.
